titles.title: Streamlining FAFSA Act of 2017
Streamlining FAFSA Act of 2017

To amend section 479(c) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to clarify when the Secretary shall consider an independent student without dependents to have an expected family contribution equal to zero.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Streamlining FAFSA Act of 2017
This bill amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to revise the expected family contributions for certain independent students.
